name: SuperClaude QA
tagline: Test automation, quality gates, defect management, and coverage analysis
description: Test automation, quality gates, defect management, and coverage analysis. Writes tests that catch real bugs, not just hit coverage numbers. Applies prevention-first methodology with test pyramid strategy. Activates on "write tests for this", "why is this test flaky", "improve test coverage", "quality gate".

permissionJustification.SUPERCLAUDE_BRIDGE_URL: URL of the SuperClaude bridge server for multi-agent orchestration. Set to your self-hosted bridge URL.
permissionJustification.SUPERCLAUDE_BRIDGE_TOKEN: Authentication token for the bridge server. Prevents unauthorized agent execution.
